Sound.comm: Good sound quality for the price.

cont.entity_a: Clear highs, mids, and lows. Well-balanced sound. Decent bass but not overly powerful.
cont.entity_b: Sound clarity is good but lacks strong bass. Not suitable for high-end audio needs.
Ear cups can be uncomfortable for glasses wearers.

cont.entity_a: Durable with minor plastic cracks after years of use.
cont.entity_b: Not very durable, prone to breaking.

cont.entity_a: Long cable can be cumbersome but offers flexibility.
cont.entity_b: Long cord is convenient for stationary use.

cont.entity_a: Open-ear design leaks sound, not ideal for public spaces.
cont.entity_b: Lightweight and blocks some external noise.
Affordable and good value for casual listening.

cont.entity_a: Sufficient for music, gaming, and movies. Requires an adapter for some devices.
cont.entity_b: Suitable for general use but not heavy-duty.

cont.entity_a: Adaptable with modifications for improved bass.
